subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Joe Girardi brought his young and surprising Marlins to Yankee Stadium and lost his first game to his mentor, Joe Torre, with a sloppy performance by the Marlins, who nevertheless were tenacious.
snippet: Joe Girardi brought his young and surprising Marlins to Yankee Stadium and lost his first game to his mentor, Joe Torre, with a sloppy performance by the Marlins, who nevertheless were tenacious.
